creator: matthew@matthewsacks.com
text:
On http://tomcat.apache.org/bugreport.html#Reporting%20Apache%20Tomcat%20bugs

This is an enhancement request for updating the documentation to be clearer about patch submission. There is a single line on how to create a svn diff and submit that as an attachment. Although straightforward and simple, it would be helpful to include another link to more resources patch submission and that the ASF uses subversion such as that provided at http://cocoon.apache.org/2.1/howto/howto-patch.html.
No problem. Should it be in xml or html?
creator: matthew@matthewsacks.com
matthew@matthewsacks.com
text:
Created attachment 25222
Modification to Tomcat site to better describe patch submission process.
